Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to determination of salary base for members of the city of New York fire department pension fund
Summary: Relates to determination of salary base for members of the city of New York fire department pension fund.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 540 of the laws of 2021 amending the retirement and social security law relating to determination of salary base for members of the city of New York fire department pension fund, in relation to the application thereof
